intro: Lastrea mosenii, commonly known as the Mosenii ice plant, is a succulent native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, which is characterized by its fleshy leaves and flowers. The plant produces small, star-shaped flowers in shades of pink and white, typically blooming in spring. Its leaves are thick and fleshy, adapted to store water in arid environments. It thrives in well-drained soil and full sun, making it a popular choice for rock gardens and xeriscaping.
